title: Java/API Big Data Engineer for a Global Device Company in Cupertino, CA
description:
Data Engineer/Product Analyst for a Global Device Company in Cupertino, CA

Job Summary:

Join the Information Apps Experimentation team dedicated to enhancing app experiences and optimizing product features. We are currently seeking a skilled Data Engineer/Product Analyst to collaborate with data scientists and contribute to scaling our operations. In this role, you will be responsible for generating reports, conducting analyses, and performing data mining tasks using programming languages like SQL, R, or Python. Additionally, expertise in data visualization and spreadsheets is essential for this position.

Qualifications:

  • Exceptional skills in SQL and Web Analytics.
  • Proficiency in Documentation, Statistics, and Python or R
  • Intermediate proficiency in Scala, Jupyter, and Hadoop
  • Understanding of Keynote/Power Point, Github, KPI understanding, and business/product acumen.
  • Knowledge of A/B testing, Data Science techniques
  • Strong problem-solving skills
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills
  • B.S., M.S., or PhD in Statistics, Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent practical experience

Location: Cupertino, CA (Flexible: 100% Onsite, Hybrid, Remote)

Type: 4+ month contract

Hourly Range: $65/hr - $75/hr (DOE)
